About This Project
This is a free and open-source project hosted on Glitch. This project was originally created by Priyam Kalra in his free time. And it was later modified by me along with a completely new web-design under the name realmeone.

This project fetches latest releases of custom roms, recoveries and kernels from @Realme1Updates, the official Telegram Channel for Realme 1, and updates them on this website. The amazing part is that it's fully automatic!

The sole aim of this project is to help out the users of Realme 1 to easily find and download custom firmware for their device, needless to say, we have no intention of earning revenue from this project/website. All permissions were taken from the creator of the original project and developers of custom firmware.

Thanks to Shashwat for his codes, Jaishnav for hosting this project and, of course Priyam Kalra!


— TechyNewbie (Owner)
